Perceptor:

Perceptor appeared behind Orchestra's back and he heard that he 
wanted speak with Chamaleon.

"Chamaleon doesn't answer in a while" answered Perceptor "He and the 
bully-guy are in cr's, altough Chamaleon will left the chambers in an 
hour... Why do you like speak with him?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Orchestra::
> 
>      Orchestra nodded.
> 
>       "Yes sir!" he said, saluting.
> 
>       Orchestra walked off.  He opened his comm-link to Chameleon.
> 
>       "Chameleon!  We need to talk!" Orchestra shouted, but 
somehow 'softly'.
